title: Requirement Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather user requirements for the MoralCompassApp, including features and functionalities. Analyze ethical theories to be integrated into the app.

title: Design the User Interface (UI)
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the MoralCompassApp's user interface, ensuring it is intuitive and easy to navigate.

title: Develop Ethical Decision Algorithm
description: Develop an algorithm to analyze user input and provide ethical guidance based on the ethical theories gathered.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a database structure to store user input, ethical theories, and generated guidance.

title: Create Unit and Integration Tests
description: Write unit tests for individual components of the app and integration tests to ensure proper functionality.

title: Deploy and Test in Staging Environment
description: Prepare the app for deployment by setting up a staging environment, deploying the app, and testing its functionality.

title: Review Code for Quality and Security
description: Conduct code reviews to ensure high-quality and secure implementation.
dependencies: Deploy and Test in Staging Environment

title: Write Documentation for Developers and Users
description: Create documentation detailing the app's functionality, usage, and development process.
dependencies: Deploy and Test in Staging Environment
